pages.md:
# Wired Connections

| Problem                                                                 | Solution                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|-------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| **The monitor is blank.**                                               | The camera is connected to a TV: Pictures will be displayed on the TV instead of in the camera monitor (üìñ 64).                                                                                          |
| **Both the TV and camera monitor are blank.**                           | The display mode selected with the VIEW MODE button is EVF ONLY + !Sensor Icon: Put your eye to the viewfinder. Use the VIEW MODE button to choose another display mode (üìñ 20).    |
| **No picture or sound on TV.**                                          | - The camera is not properly connected: Connect the camera properly (üìñ 64).                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                         | - Input on the television is set to ‚ÄúTV‚Äù: Set input to ‚ÄúHDMI‚Äù (üìñ 64).                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                         | - The volume on the TV is too low: Use the controls on the television to adjust the volume (üìñ 64).                                                                                                      |
| **The computer does not recognize the camera.**                         | Be sure the camera and computer are correctly connected (üìñ 255).                                                                                                                                       |
| **FUJIFILM X RAW STUDIO or FUJIFILM X Acquire fails to correctly detect the camera.** | Check camera settings. If the camera is connected via USB, be sure 5: USB RAW CONV./BACKUP RESTORE is chosen for SELECT CONNECTION SETTING (üìñ 291, 292).                                                |
| **Cannot connect to iPhones or iPads.**                                 | POWER SUPPLY ON/COMM OFF is selected for USB POWER SUPPLY/COMM SETTING. Select POWER SUPPLY OFF/COMM ON when the camera is connected via a Lightning connection to a device that does not supply power (üìñ 254). |
| **Cannot connect to smartphone.**                                       | Confirm that the camera is correctly connected: The procedure for connecting the camera varies with the type of connector with which the smartphone is equipped (üìñ 252).                                |

rows: The camera is connected to a TV: Pictures will be displayed on the TV instead of in the camera monitor (üìñ 64).
**Both the TV and camera monitor are blank.**
The display mode selected with the VIEW MODE button is EVF ONLY + !Sensor Icon: Put your eye to the viewfinder. Use the VIEW MODE button to choose another display mode (üìñ 20).
- The camera is not properly connected: Connect the camera properly (üìñ 64).
- Input on the television is set to ‚ÄúTV‚Äù: Set input to ‚ÄúHDMI‚Äù (üìñ 64).
- The volume on the TV is too low: Use the controls on the television to adjust the volume (üìñ 64).
**The computer does not recognize the camera.**
Be sure the camera and computer are correctly connected (üìñ 255).
**FUJIFILM X RAW STUDIO or FUJIFILM X Acquire fails to correctly detect the camera.**
Check camera settings. If the camera is connected via USB, be sure 5: USB RAW CONV./BACKUP RESTORE is chosen for SELECT CONNECTION SETTING (üìñ 291, 292).

POWER SUPPLY ON/COMM OFF is selected for USB POWER SUPPLY/COMM SETTING. Select POWER SUPPLY OFF/COMM ON when the camera is connected via a Lightning connection to a device that does not supply power (üìñ 254).
Confirm that the camera is correctly connected: The procedure for connecting the camera varies with the type of connector with which the smartphone is equipped (üìñ 252).
